author: cms-sw
body:
This should fix the env issue reported in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/38605 . 
This also fixes the issue of copying dd4hep plugins ( as reported [here](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/38605#issuecomment-1176404585) )
title: Multi-arch IBs env fix for patch releases
